Title: Kampung Drift
Writer: Nevin Hiong, Tommy Loh, Puovin Sandera
Actors: Fatin Afeefa, Pablo Amirul, Pekin Ibrahim, Mohd Syafie Naswip
Plot: Combining action, comedy and sci-fi, Kampung Drift is a cross-genre coming-of-age tale of Johan, a teenager in search of the meaning of life and love through drift racing.
